summary: This film recounts Henri Verneuil's relationship with his father who had brought his Armenian family to Marseille, France, in order to escape from the Armenian Genocide in the Ottoman Empire.
cast: Richard Berry|Omar Sharif|Nathalie Roussel|Claudia Cardinale|Diane Bellego|Jacky Nercessian|Isabelle Sadoyan|Zabou Breitman|Jacques Villeret|Sylvie Joly|Cédric Doucet|Tom Ponsin|Stéphane Servais|Danièle Lebrun|Ginette Garcin|Ève Ruggieri|Maurice Chevit|Jean-Pierre Delage|Henry Djanik|André Julien|Philippe Dehesdin|Raoul Curet|Jean-Gabriel Nordmann|Pierre-Olivier Faïs|Nicolas Vacaro|Christophe Combettes|Alexis Tomassian|Jennifer Bostroem|Jacques Ciron|Bernard Spiegel|Pierre Belot|Marie Verdi|Bernard Bireaud|Gérard Dessalles|Salah Teskouk|Stéphane Slima|Nicole Gueden|Pascale Quelfennec|Etienne Bartholomeus|Jean-Michel Molé|Véronique Kapoyan|Brigitte Barry|Dorothée Picard|Bernard Musson|Henri Verneuil
title: 588 rue Paradis
